Title: Relates to the display of live races and special events on telephones
Summary: Provides specific authority to video stream live races to any New York licensed track or off-track betting corporation which accepts internet wagers.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to displaying live races and special events on telephones
